settings.heading: Alice in Tokyo
settings.text:
Discover a world of wonder at Alice in Tokyo, located at 5-12-6 Shinjuku Heights, Shinjuku, Tokyo 160-0022. Inspired by the enchanting whimsy of Alice in Wonderland, our store brings a touch of magic to your shopping experience in the heart of Shinjuku.


Step inside and explore a carefully curated selection of fashion, accessories, and home décor that blend fantasy with contemporary style. From limited-edition apparel to quirky accessories and unique collectibles, Alice in Tokyo offers something special for dreamers and explorers alike.


Our store is designed to transport you into a world where the extraordinary meets everyday life, making every visit a delightful adventure. Whether you’re a local resident or a traveler seeking unique finds, our dedicated team is here to assist you in discovering the perfect piece to add to your collection.


Store Hours:

Monday - Saturday: 11:00 AM - 8:00 PM

Sunday: 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM


Contact Us:

Phone: +81 3-5555-6789

Email: info@aliceintokyo.jp


Come experience the magic of Alice in Tokyo, where the whimsical meets the modern!

settings.heading: Alice in Kyoto
settings.text:
Experience the magic of wonder and tradition at Alice in Kyoto, located at 1-7-4 Kiyamachi Plaza, Hokicho, Fushimi, Kyoto 612-8055. Set against the tranquil charm of Hokicho, our store offers a unique blend of whimsical fantasy and Kyoto’s rich cultural legacy.


At Alice in Kyoto, explore a handpicked selection of exclusive fashion, accessories, and home décor that bring a touch of the extraordinary to everyday life. From intricately designed apparel to charming accessories inspired by the world of Alice in Wonderland, every piece in our store tells a story of imagination and elegance.


Inspired by the historic streets of Kyoto, we offer timeless items with a modern twist, perfect for collectors and adventurers alike. Whether you’re searching for the perfect accessory or a keepsake to remember your journey, our staff is here to guide you through an unforgettable shopping experience.


Store Hours:

Monday - Saturday: 10:30 AM - 7:00 PM

Sunday: 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM


Contact Us:

Phone: +81 75-876-4321

Email: kyoto@aliceintokyo.jp


Step into Alice in Kyoto today and discover a world where tradition and fantasy come together in perfect harmony!

settings.heading: Alice in Yokohama
settings.address: 3-14-8 Sakura Avenue, Honcho, Yokohama 231-0005, Alice in Yokohama
settings.text:
Located in the heart of Yokohama at 3-14-8 Sakura Avenue, Honcho, Yokohama 231-0005, Alice in Yokohama offers a whimsical shopping experience inspired by the fantastical world of Alice in Wonderland.

Our store is a haven for those seeking imaginative fashion, quirky accessories, and unique home décor. Each item in Alice in Yokohama is carefully curated to bring a touch of magic to your everyday life. From stylish apparel to playful trinkets, we blend the charm of fantasy with the chic sophistication of modern Yokohama.

Situated in the lively Honcho district, our store combines timeless elegance with playful creativity, making it a must-visit destination for locals and visitors alike. Whether you’re on the hunt for a standout piece or a whimsical gift, our team is ready to guide you through a wonderland of possibilities.

Store Hours:
Monday - Saturday: 11:00 AM - 7:30 PM
Sunday: 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM

Contact Us:
Phone: +81 45-123-4567
Email: yokohama@aliceintokyo.jp

Visit Alice in Yokohama and immerse yourself in a world where fantasy meets modern style!

settings.heading: Explore Alice in Wonderland Across Japan
settings.description: Discover Alice in Tokyo, Kyoto, and Yokohama—where fantasy meets style. Each store offers a unique blend of whimsical fashion, accessories, and décor inspired by Alice in Wonderland, perfectly tailored to its city’s charm. Dive into a magical shopping experience today!
